Name: Repair of potholes.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the repair of potholes.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1.  Title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-154 to read as follows: 
§19-154  Repair of potholes.  The department shall ensure that any reported street defect including potholes are repaired, corrected and/or fixed within three days from when such report is received by the department. 
§2. This local law shall take effect ninety days after enactment. 

BH
